action.action-desc: Mr. DeFazio (for himself, Mr. LoBiondo, Mr. Larsen of Washington, and Mr. Ferguson) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To ensure that permits issued by the Secretary of Transportation to foreign air carriers under the United States-European Union Air Transport Agreement of April 2007 do not undermine labor rights or standards, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Flags of Convenience Don’t Fly Here Act.

section.header: Foreign air transportation under United States-European Union Air Transport Agreement
section.text: The Secretary of Transportation may not issue a permit under section 41302 of title 49, United States Code, or an exemption under section 40109 of such title, authorizing a person to provide foreign air transportation as a foreign air carrier under the United States-European Union Air Transport Agreement of April 2007 (as amended) in a proceeding in which the applicability of Article 17 bis of such Agreement has been raised by an interested person, unless the Secretary—

paragraph.text: finds that issuing the permit or exemption would be consistent with the intent set forth in Article 17 bis of the Agreement, that opportunities created by the Agreement do not undermine labor standards or the labor-related rights and principles contained in the laws of the respective parties to the Agreement; and
imposes on the permit or exemption such conditions as may be necessary to ensure that the person complies with the intent of Article 17 bis.

section.text: Section 41302(2) of title 49, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (A) by striking under an agreement with the United States Government; or and inserting ; and; and

in subparagraph (B) by striking the foreign air transportation and inserting after considering the totality of the circumstances, including the factors set forth in section 40101(a), the foreign air transportation.

subsection.text: Section 40101(a) of title 49, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: preventing entry into United States markets by flag of convenience carriers.

subsection.text: Section 40101(e)(9) of title 49, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (D) by striking and at the end;
in subparagraph (E) by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: erosion of labor standards associated with flag of convenience carriers.

subsection.text: Section 40102(a) of title 49, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: by redesignating paragraphs (21) through (47) as paragraphs (22) through (48), respectively; and
by inserting after paragraph (20) the following:
flag of convenience carrier means a foreign air carrier that is established in a country other than the home country of its majority owner or owners in order to avoid regulations of the home country.
